member.name: DigitalWindowSetting
member.summary: Represents the bounds settings of the digital window for video capture.

member.name: DigitalWindowSetting.OriginX
member.summary: The x-axis value of the left side of the digital window bounds.

member.name: DigitalWindowSetting.OriginY
member.summary: The y-axis value of the top side of the digital window bounds.

member.name: DigitalWindowSetting.WindowSize
member.summary: A value specifying the scale of the digital window bounds.
